body:
Online forums allow you to share your story, tell people how youâ€™re feeling and discuss any concerns you have.

You can get advice from others by posting a question or sharing your story.

The following are examples of helpful forums:

- [Parent Connection](http://www.theparentconnection.org.uk/posts)
- [Dad.info](https://www.dad.info/forum/index)
- [Mumsnet](https://www.mumsnet.com/Talk)
- [Wikivorce](https://www.wikivorce.com/divorce/About-Us.html)
- [Gingerbread](https://gingerbread.org.uk/Forum/default.aspx)
heading: Use online forums
